languages.text: "Я..." {n}Девушка понижает голос до шепота.{/n} "Я переодетая простолюдинка, мил{mf|орд|еди}. А это — мой хозяин. Я знаю, что должна притворяться богачкой, но понимаете... У меня было много других господ. И сэр Хайфут — единственный, кто ласково относится к слугам. Я хочу защитить его от этих жестоких людей".

"I..." {n}she whispers quietly.{/n} "I'm just a commoner in a fancy dress, {mf|m'lord|m'lady}. This man is my master. I know I'm supposed to be playing the part of a rich girl, but... I've served many lords, you see, and Sir Timeus is the only one who treats his servants with gentleness. I want to protect him from these cruel people."
languages.original_text: "Я..." {n}Девушка понижает голос до шепота.{/n} "Я переодетая простолюдинка, мил{mf|орд|еди}. А это — мой хозяин. Я знаю, что должна притворяться богачкой, но понимаете... У меня было много других господ. И сэр Хайфут — единственный, кто ласково относится к слугам. Я хочу защитить его от этих жестоких людей".

I want to protect him from these cruel people."

I've served many lords, you see, and Sir Timeus is the only one who treats his servants with gentleness. I want to protect him from these cruel people."

languages.text: “我……”{n}她以轻柔的声音开了口。{/n}“我不过是一介平民，穿着贵族的服装而已，大人，而这个人是我的主人。我知道，我应该好好扮演富家千金的角色，可……如您所知，我曾侍奉过许多位领主，而提梅斯爵士是唯一一个温和对待仆人的人。我想保护他，不让他被这些残忍的人伤害。”
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}she whispers quietly.{/n} "I'm just a commoner in a fancy dress, {mf|m'lord|m'lady}. This man is my master. I know I'm supposed to be playing the part of a rich girl, but... I've served many lords, you see, and Sir Timeus is the only one who treats his servants with gentleness. I want to protect him from these cruel people."

traits.locale_text: “我……”{n}她以轻柔的声音开了口。{/n}“我不过是一介平民，穿着贵族的服装而已，大人，而这个人是我的主人。我知道，我应该好好扮演富家千金的角色，可……如您所知，我曾侍奉过许多位领主，而提梅斯爵士是唯一一个温和对待仆人的人。我想保护他，不让他被这些残忍的人伤害。”

languages.text: 「私は…」{n}女性は小声で囁いた。{/n}「私は派手なドレスを着ているだけの、ただの平民です。天の{mf|君|姫}。この方は私のご主人様です。裕福なお嬢様のふりをするよう言われていましたが…これまで多くのご主人様に仕えてきました。でも、タイミアス様だけが使用人に優しく接してくれたのです。私は、これらの残酷な人たちからこの方を守りたいんです」
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}she whispers quietly.{/n} "I'm just a commoner in a fancy dress, {mf|m'lord|m'lady}. This man is my master. I know I'm supposed to be playing the part of a rich girl, but... I've served many lords, you see, and Sir Timeus is the only one who treats his servants with gentleness. I want to protect him from these cruel people."

traits.locale_text: 「私は…」{n}女性は小声で囁いた。{/n}「私は派手なドレスを着ているだけの、ただの平民です。天の{mf|君|姫}。この方は私のご主人様です。裕福なお嬢様のふりをするよう言われていましたが…これまで多くのご主人様に仕えてきました。でも、タイミアス様だけが使用人に優しく接してくれたのです。私は、これらの残酷な人たちからこの方を守りたいんです」

languages.text: «Yo...», {n}susurra quedamente.{/n} «No soy más que una plebeya con un vestido bonito, {mf|milord|milady}. Este hombre es mi amo. Sé que debería fingir que soy una muchacha adinerada, pero... He servido a muchos amos, ¿sabe? Y sir Timeus es el único que trata con gentileza a la servidumbre. Deseo protegerlo de esta turba cruel».
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}she whispers quietly.{/n} "I'm just a commoner in a fancy dress, {mf|m'lord|m'lady}. This man is my master. I know I'm supposed to be playing the part of a rich girl, but... I've served many lords, you see, and Sir Timeus is the only one who treats his servants with gentleness. I want to protect him from these cruel people."

traits.locale_text: «Yo...» {n}susurra quedamente.{/n} «No soy más que una plebeya con un vestido bonito, {mf|milord|milady}. Este hombre es mi amo. Sé que debería fingir que soy una muchacha adinerada, pero... He servido a muchos amos, ¿sabe? Y sir Timeus es el único que trata con gentileza a la servidumbre. Deseo protegerlo de esta turba cruel».

languages.text: "Ben..." {n}Sessizce fısıldıyor.{/n} "Ben sadece süslü elbiseli, sıradan bir kimseyim {mf|lordum|leydim}. Bu adam benim efendim. Zengin bir kız rolünü oynamam gerektiğini biliyorum ama... Birçok efendiye hizmet ettim ve aralarında hizmetkârlarına nazik davranan bir tek Sör Timeus'du. Onu bu zalimlerden korumak istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}she whispers quietly.{/n} "I'm just a commoner in a fancy dress, {mf|m'lord|m'lady}. This man is my master. I know I'm supposed to be playing the part of a rich girl, but... I've served many lords, you see, and Sir Timeus is the only one who treats his servants with gentleness. I want to protect him from these cruel people."

traits.locale_text: "Ben..." {n}Sessizce fısıldıyor.{/n} "Ben sadece süslü elbiseli, sıradan bir kimseyim {mf|lordum|leydim}. Bu adam benim efendim. Zengin bir kız rolünü oynamam gerektiğini biliyorum ama... Birçok efendiye hizmet ettim ve aralarında hizmetkârlarına nazik davranan bir tek Sör Timeus'du. Onu bu zalimlerden korumak istiyorum."

languages.text: « Je... {n}murmure-t-elle.{/n} Je ne suis qu'une roturière affublée d'une belle robe, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}. Cet homme est mon maître. Je sais que je suis censée jouer le rôle d'une riche aristocrate, mais... J'ai servi de nombreux nobles, et messire Timeus est le seul à traiter ses domestiques avec bienveillance. Je veux le protéger de ces gens cruels. »
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}she whispers quietly.{/n} "I'm just a commoner in a fancy dress, {mf|m'lord|m'lady}. This man is my master. I know I'm supposed to be playing the part of a rich girl, but... I've served many lords, you see, and Sir Timeus is the only one who treats his servants with gentleness. I want to protect him from these cruel people."

traits.locale_text: « Je... {n}murmure-t-elle.{/n} Je ne suis qu'une roturière affublée d'une belle robe, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}. Cet homme est mon maître. Je sais que je suis censée jouer le rôle d'une riche aristocrate, mais... J'ai servi de nombreux nobles, et messire Timeus est le seul à traiter ses domestiques avec bienveillance. Je veux le protéger de ces gens cruels. »

languages.text: "Ich ...", {n}flüstert sie leise.{/n} "Ich bin nur eine einfache Bürgerin in einem schicken Kleid, {mf|Herr|Herrin}. Ich arbeite für diesen Mann. Ich weiß, ich soll die Rolle eines reichen Mädchens spielen, aber ... Ich habe schon vielen Herren gedient, müsst Ihr wissen, und Sir Timeus ist der Einzige, der seine Dienerschaft gut behandelt. Ich will ihn vor diesen grausamen Leuten beschützen."
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}she whispers quietly.{/n} "I'm just a commoner in a fancy dress, {mf|m'lord|m'lady}. This man is my master. I know I'm supposed to be playing the part of a rich girl, but... I've served many lords, you see, and Sir Timeus is the only one who treats his servants with gentleness.
